title: SmartQ - Quiz App
description: Fast, lightweight mobile quiz app offering instant access to fun and challenging quizzes across science, tech, and pop culture. No logins needed just tap, play, and learn.

title: Glowing Dragon Cursor Follower

title: Infosphere Nexus
description: A responsive platform offering multi-domain educational content and project showcases for learners, developers, and enthusiasts.

title: QR Code Generator
description: Generates and scans QR codes in real-time. Users can download QR codes as images. Simple and effective for quick sharing.

title: To-Do List
description: Minimalist task management web app to add, delete, and mark tasks. Stores data locally for persistent use.

title: Digital Clock & Countdown Timer
description: Real-time digital clock with 12/24-hour toggle and a sleek countdown timer. Ideal for productivity or embedding in web pages.

title: Memory Game
description: Flip-card memory game that tests and enhances memory skills. Randomized cards, score tracking, and responsive animations.

title: Flappyman Game
description: An arcade-style game inspired by Flappy Bird. Navigate through obstacles, score high, and enjoy engaging sound effects.
